Indialantic is a town in Brevard County, Florida. The town's population was 2,888 at the 2020 United States Census. It is part of the Palm Bay-Melbourne-Titusville Metropolitan Statistical Area. ==References== Category:Towns in Florida
title: Indialantic, Florida
